Articles.Content:
The Eagle G1 Glider

Below is a picture of the glider with the lander gear up. When you reach the appropriate altitude with the plane, just decouple the engines and glide very far. Control of the glider is very easy as it is a very stable craft. This craft is essentially the glider itself with engines attached to the wings. On takeoff the plane looks a bit odd but it takes off just like any other plane. An advantage of this plane over others is that you can land very easily with it without using any fuel and you don't need parachutes.

Mediafire link http://www./download/l5ip8pyhwiyy4k8/Eagle+G1+Glider.craft

Edited July 25, 2014 by Citizen_Carnage
